attributes.action: Furlough available for people who started a new job on or after 28th February.
attributes.additional_details: Add those people to the new job retention scheme please as its unfair otherwise.
attributes.background: Furlough pay available for people who moved jobs-resigned or left the previous employer for other reasons on or after 28th February; and they found employment since therefore have been on current employer's PAYE since 28th February.

Find out more and watch the Committee put questions suggested by petitioners to Government Ministers and the Deputy Chief Medical Officer: https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/145767/committee-question-deputy-chief-medical-officer-and-ministers-on-coronavirus-response/
